typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ActorID as string,
		ActorName as string,
		Gender as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> VAActors
source(output(
		ActorID as string,
		ActorName as string,
		Gender as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> FCActors
source(output(
		id as string,
		name as string,
		title as string,
		genre as string,
		rating as string,
		runtime as string,
		releaseYear as string,
		availabilityDate as string,
		streamingAvailabilityDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SRMOVIEFLAT
FCActors, VAActors, DerivedColumn1 union(byName: true)~> MergeVAFC
MergeVAFC derive(ActorName = case(isNull(ActorName),'Unknown Actor Name',ActorName),
		Gender = case(isNull(Gender),'U',Gender)) ~> NullChecks
NullChecks keyGenerate(output(ActorSK as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SRMOVIEFLAT aggregate(groupBy(name),
	ActorCount = count(name)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 select(mapColumn(
		ActorName = name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(ActorID = uuid()) ~> DerivedColumn1
SurrogateKey1 sink(input(
		{02e7ebe8-e09c-40f5-ba46-ab465bd0f73f} as string,
		Kelemen as string,
		Orsos as string,
		{5555550673} as string,
		{2017-01-03 00:00:00.00000004} as string,
		{2017-01-03 00:00:00.00000005} as string,
		SR as string,
		{3d034f2a-b657-4c80-b312-6adb8e1c99b8} as string,
		{155 Pine St} as string,
		Prop_9 as string,
		Portland as string,
		OR as string,
		{85101} as string,
		{1} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> OutletToDLPREP
